data.title: Karen Martin Artwork.com
data.meta_description: Karen Martin - Creative and successful artist who likes the experimental approach and works in different mediums including mixed media, life and printmaking , living in Amersham ,UK
data.text:
​

To call myself an experimentalist has now become a normal way of thinking for me as an artist.

​

After a career as a midwife I went on to study art at Amersham and Wycombe college never imagining just how exciting my journey through thesubject was to

be .

​

It meant taking risks and not being afraid to make mistakes.

​

During the recent lockdowns joining other artists online I was able to find both new , different and interesting ways to rediscover the joy of art with some unexpected results on occasions.

​

My work is influenced by found materials, collage, mark making and alternative methods of working, inspired by sketching and use of scenery both local and on location.

​

Abstraction plays a part in my work and with the natural form of regular life drawing as well as printmaking I get inspiration and freedom to express what I hope to achieve.

​

My enjoyment of photography helps with detail and keeping my work alive and fresh is essential to my practice. I regularly attend courses and spent a year as a student at the Newlyn School of Art.

A Selected member of Bucks Art Society.

​

​

Exhibiting regularly with local art groups and galleries as well as in London, including the Royal Academy Summer Exhibition 2019, Dulwich Picture Gallery, Highgate Literary and Scientific Institute , Green&Stone, Chelsea. &The Collective Gallery, St Albans.

​

Instagram- kartinm125
